author: UpIsNotJump
description:
You can take advantage of an 84% discount, i.e. $2.03 per month + 4 months free by clicking on this link: https://cyberghostvpn.com/UpIsNotJump. Thanks to CyberGhostVPN for sponsoring the video. 

After over 700 hours of work, I’m finally ready to share my KCD2 video!!  Kingdom Come: Deliverance 2 Is An Absolute Nightmare A huge review covering the whole game from gameplay mechanics to story. 

If you enjoy this level of production, please consider supporting me on Patreon — it’s the only way I can keep making these!
 👉   https://www.patreon.com/c/UpIsNotJump

As usual this video needed help from artists, animators, editors camera people, special effects artists, makeup artists, the people at Norton Armories rentals, props assistant, and set designers. All came together to make it (hopefully) amazing! So please consider supporting if you enjoy!

#KCD2 #KingdomComeDeliverance2
